item.title: The Cherry Bomb by Paige Hender
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Paige Hender shares with us a lovely thoughtful autobio comic about ‘virginities’, sexual experiences, and living in a world where there’s so much pressure to live and go fast. It’s a lovely reminder that we don’t have to rush things and that you can set whatever pace you like when it comes to the world […]
item.content:encoded:
The Cherry Bomb by Paige Hender

by Matthew Nolan on 01/18/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Non-Fiction Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Paige Hender shares with us a lovely thoughtful autobio comic about ‘virginities’, sexual experiences, and living in a world where there’s so much pressure to live and go fast. It’s a lovely reminder that we don’t have to rush things and that you can set whatever pace you like when it comes to the world of sex. Thank you Paige, it’s thoughtful and beautiful and Oh Joy Sex Toy is lucky to have it!

Go visit Paige, let her know she’s awesomesauce.

  • Instagram

Thank you Lena Let for a wonderfully amazing and sexy piece! LenaLets Twitter Not much news for you all this week. Erika’s still busy working away at […]
item.content:encoded:
Perfect Weather by Lena Let

by Matthew Nolan on 01/11/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

Oh heck, I lovvvvvve this comic so dang much! From the colors to the sexy action; it’s the bright and happy start to the year we all need.

Thank you Lena Let for a wonderfully amazing and sexy piece!

  • LenaLets Twitter

Not much news for you all this week. Erika’s still busy working away at a new Patreon/splitting our current Patreon for her autobio comics. So stay tuned on that front. In the meantime, I know Omicron is making the rounds, so stay warm and safe out there folks.

In the ramp-up to Valentines, we know some of you might be fishing for a latest BEST OF comic or list. With Erika still stepping away from OJST and our toy-testing-days about 6 months out of date, we don’t have a NEW list for you all. Instead, we’ll be recommending LAST YEAR’S list as, heck, these are still all the toys and recommendations that we hold near and dear. These are STILL all the toys we recommend without a blink. So if you’re in the mood to shop, start there!

item.title: Frog Princesses by Binky and DaZa
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: It’s almost traditional now that as the new year rolls around we end up posting a bundle of saucy comics! Starting the new year out with a bang ;D Binky and Daza had been working on this wonderful take on the Princess Frog tale for a while and brought it over to me to see […]
item.content:encoded:
Frog Princesses by Binky and DaZa

by Matthew Nolan on 01/04/2022 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

It’s almost traditional now that as the new year rolls around we end up posting a bundle of saucy comics! Starting the new year out with a bang ;D

Binky and Daza had been working on this wonderful take on the Princess Frog tale for a while and brought it over to me to see if we’d be interested in posting it. Heck, this is so wonderful and sexy and sweet- I leapt (hopped?) at the chance to have it here on the site and in your browsers.

  • Binky Instagram
  • Binky Patreon
  • Daza Twitter
  • Daza IG
  • Daza Patreon

Daza’s been here before if you want to peek at their previous comic!

Hope you enjoy today’s comic! A huge thank you to all the Patrons and our Sponsor for keeping this site alive and well this past year! We truly don’t take any of you for granted and appreciate every buck of support you send us.

A Happy new year’s friends. Let’s make this one a good one =)

item.title: Landmarks by Hien Pham
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Another year rolls by and, if you’re like me, you can look down and see all the new landmarks accrued. 2021’s over, we made it, we survived another one. Hien Pham’s here today being brutally honest and open and amazing. I think it’s an important one, well worth the read, it makes me ever thankful […]
item.content:encoded:
Landmarks by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 12/28/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Education Comics »
  • Favorites »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Guest Education »
  • Health »
  • Interviews »
  • Non-Fiction Comics

Another year rolls by and, if you’re like me, you can look down and see all the new landmarks accrued. 2021’s over, we made it, we survived another one.

Hien Pham’s here today being brutally honest and open and amazing. I think it’s an important one, well worth the read, it makes me ever thankful Hien is here making us comics. Do make sure to tell him he’s amazing. You can read more of his OJST comics here!

  • Portfolio
  • Interactive stuff
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Sexy Comics

2021 was a biggie for us here; Erika’s been stepping away from OJST and we’ve been working to fill those big shoes. As we step forward into 2022, we’re hoping to continue on the changes and adaption for the site, to keep building it slowly but surely into a community and team-driven platform. Here to leave people better off than they arrived, no matter the person. I hope you’ll continue to join us as we go.

We don’t really DO big pledge drives (maybe we should?), but if you like what we do here please know that we run a Patreon where you can chip in a buck per comic for work we post here. It keeps us going and helps us pay a professional rate to our artists. Truly, a few months of support means the world.

└ Tags: autobio, beard, body, body image, body positivity, bodyimage, bodypositivity, curve, curves, grey hair, guest, guest comic, Hien Pham, HienPham, insecurities, landmarks, stretch mark

item.content:encoded:
Flashrunner by Xero Skyfire

by Matthew Nolan on 12/21/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »

A happy happy New Matrix Day to you all!

Xero Skyfire is here today, delivering us some saucy cyberpunk freerunning sexytimes! It’s lewd, rude, and just too much fun. When Xero handed in these files I HAD to bump her work up to match with the Matrix release. As a 90s kid running a sexy webcomic, it felt too perfect of an homage to one of the most important films of my young life.

Go visit Xero and let her know she drew up a heck of a comic!

  • Twitter
  • Patreon

Hoping you all managed to get some RnR in this winter period!

One of these was the amazing (and still well worth the read) Go Get A Roomie (which has since concluded and is now re-running). Welp, in those years since, the amazing and talented Clover has been BUSY […]
item.content:encoded:
Friend Love by Clover

by Matthew Nolan on 12/14/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Interviews »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Longtime readers might remember a time when we had up trading adverts with other webcomics on the site. One of these was the amazing (and still well worth the read) Go Get A Roomie (which has since concluded and is now re-running). Welp, in those years since, the amazing and talented Clover has been BUSY creating a beautiful fantasy comic called Headless Bliss and a brand new stunning character and story comic called Little Tiny Things. Honestly, you can’t go wrong.

Today’s comic makes me want to reach out and tell all my friends I love ’em. Just fantastic – thank you Clover!

  • Headless Bliss (webcomic)
  • Little Tiny Things (NEW Webcomic)

Matthew here, to add in some links!
Thank you, Jey! You can find this specific packer in a few spots listed below, but after that, we’ve also put in the rest of OJST’s affiliated stores, as there really are a whole swath of packers out there to explore. My recommendation? If this one doesn’t grab at you, take a peek at the New York Toy Collective for some choice options (we’ve reviewed a couple of their packers in the past!)

Seeing this comic come together was a rollercoaster for me; it reminded me of all those years of LDR that Erika and I went through. It really hit close to home and reminded me of our early […]
item.content:encoded:
Cake For Breakfast by Hien Pham

by Matthew Nolan on 11/30/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

Today Hien’s back with a stunning Long Distance Relationship comic that gets all kinds of sexy and fun.

Seeing this comic come together was a rollercoaster for me; it reminded me of all those years of LDR that Erika and I went through. It really hit close to home and reminded me of our early romantic life and just made me feel things.

Long Distance is hard as fuck. For everyone out there keeping their relationship alive long distance: You all deserve some cake.

*

*PS: Hien had to sex-ducate me with today’s comic, I legit didn’t know ‘cake’ was a thing 0_0 Gettin’ old, Nolan! Gettin’ old.

PPS. Here’s some other LDRs comics to peek at =D

item.title: My Adult Dating Anxiety by Liv Hamilton
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Dating can be daunting and especially so when you’re just beginning to do it later in life than your peers. We’re so appreciative of Liv Hamilton for talking about their experience of coming out and going out as an adult when “everyone else” has been doing it since their teen years- or, at least, that’s […]
item.content:encoded:
My Adult Dating Anxiety by Liv Hamilton

by Matthew Nolan on 11/16/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Guest Comics »
  • Interviews »
  • Non-Fiction Comics »
  • Sex & Sexuality

Dating can be daunting and especially so when you’re just beginning to do it later in life than your peers. We’re so appreciative of Liv Hamilton for talking about their experience of coming out and going out as an adult when “everyone else” has been doing it since their teen years- or, at least, that’s what it feels like. If you’re looking for the first step in tackling your own queer dating anxiety, read 7 Ways for Gay Singles to Overcome Dating Anxiety.

Now go check out more of Liv’s work and don’t let your anxiety hold you back from telling them what a great job they did!

  • Portfolio
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

Here’s a few resources on dating anxiety for queer folks:

item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan

Follow along as we take a short dive into this couple’s sexploration and strap-on adventure! Then when you’re done, go tell this talented artist just how awesome he is! […]
item.content:encoded:
Trying New Things by DicksnDemons

by Matthew Nolan on 11/09/2021 at 12:02 am
  • Comic »
  • Fun Smutty Comics »
  • Guest Comics

It’s getting cold outside so let’s turn up the heat.
DicksnDemons is here today with a sweet, sexy, intimate and NSFW comic. That’s just… gosh… oh-so-lovely. Follow along as we take a short dive into this couple’s sexploration and strap-on adventure!

Then when you’re done, go tell this talented artist just how awesome he is!

  • NSFW Twitter
  • SFW Twitter
  • FurAffinity
  • Kofi

Today’s comic got you yearning to strap in for more strap-on content? We understand.
Check it out:
– All our Harness Comics
– All our Strap-On Comics
– A wonderful comic on DIY Harnessing by Isabella Rotman
– A fun short comic on the ‘Share’ by Trystan Falcone
– Erika and my’s review of our most favsies harness, the Jaguar (and our favsies pegging dildo for it, the Velvet!)

In other news!

While I still need to update some copy about it on some of the pages, I’m super excited to announce that we’ve finally settled on this year’s Sponsorship. Oh Joy Sex Toy is once again supported by OMGYes.com for the whole of this next year. They’re ensuring we don’t need to make use of crazy ads to keep this ship rolling! I can’t express how much Sponsorship means to us and the site. In addition to the vital support we get from Patreon, Sponsorship affords us the ability to pay our guests artists a wage, keep the site updating week-to-week, and keep the site healthy n’ hosted. A few months back the future of OJST was still up in the air (and heck it still might be – we’ll see how things are after 6 months), so to have OMGYes come back ready and willing to support us during these turbulent times, it means everything.

We’ll get them a fresh review when they eventually drop their next season of episodes (soon!), but if you’ve ever been sitting on the idea of a sign up we can’t encourage you more strongly. Check out our previous reviews of season one and season two. This team and website deserve all the sign-ups they can get – AND – it’s just an amazing site.

by Jey Pawlik on 11/02/2021 at 12:02 am

Hey everyone, Jey here, with another autobio story for you all!

I’ve been doing erotic comics with my partner since 2013 and wanted to delve into how that started and what it was like. This ended up being my love letter to porn comics which have helped me grow so much as a comic artist, and are my preferred porn of choice!

I’m super excited to be on the OJST team where I’ll be posting monthly comics for you all! Strap in and strap on!
